item.title: State and parameter estimation
item.description: This research proposes a systematic approach to characterizing the behavior of human pilots engaged in a tracking task. "Behavior" should be understood as different control strategies that quadrotor pilots use to accomplish their goals, which are usually manifested through their joystick inputs.

item.title: Multi-UAV system
item.description: Real-time distributed NMPC for tracking and formation control of multi-UAV systems in forest-like environments.
